titleStmt.title: The Iesuites Pater noster giuen to Phillip III King of Spaine for his new yeares gift this present yeare. 1611. Together with the Ave Maria. Written first in French: Englished by W.I.
titleStmt.author: W. I., fl. 1611.

notesStmt.note: Suggested actual imprint information from STC.
A bitter satire against the Jesuits--Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
